# inverted

**Instance Property**

Returns an inverted copy of the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc var inverted: CharacterSet { get }
```

## Inverting a Character Set

- **invert()**: Invert the contents of the `CharacterSet`.
title: inverted
